source.sqlReaderQuery:
DECLARE @currenQ DATE,
@mEnddate DATE
SELECT
    @currenQ = CAST(
        DateAdd(
            day,
            -1,
            dateadd(qq, DateDiff(qq, 0, GETDATE()), 0)
        ) AS DATE
    )
SELECT
    @mEnddate = CAST(MAX(EndTime) AS DATE)
FROM
    [Prod_CashFlow].[reporting].[CashFlowEntry]
WHERE
    EndTime IS NOT NULL;



WITH CashFlowRaw AS (
    SELECT
        [WorkMatter],
        [Exposure],
        [ValueName],
        [Amount],
        [EndUser],
        [EndTime],
        @currenQ as Cashflowentryperiod,
        EOMONTH(
            CAST(
                (
                    RIGHT('00' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, (Quarter * 3)), 2) + '-' + RIGHT('00' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, 5), 2) + '-' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, [YEAR])
                ) as Date
            )
        ) as CFProjectionsfor,
        DateDIFF(
            quarter,
            @currenQ,
            EOMONTH(
                CAST(
                    (
                        RIGHT('00' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, (Quarter * 3)), 2) + '-' + RIGHT('00' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, 5), 2) + '-' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, [YEAR])
                    ) as Date
                )
            )
        ) as datediff
    FROM
        [Prod_CashFlow].[reporting].[CashFlowEntry]
    where
        (
            CAST(EndTime AS DATE) IS NULL
            or CAST(EndTime AS DATE) = @mEnddate
        )
        and Year != 0
        and DateDIFF(
            quarter,
            @currenQ,
            EOMONTH(
                CAST(
                    (
                        RIGHT('00' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, (Quarter * 3)), 2) + '-' + RIGHT('00' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, 5), 2) + '-' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, [YEAR])
                    ) as Date
                )
            )
        ) in ('1', '2', '3', '4', '5', '6')
    union
    SELECT
        [WorkMatter],
        [Exposure],
        [ValueName],
        [Amount],
        [EndUser],
        [EndTime],
        @currenQ as Cashflowentryperiod,
        NULL as CFProjectionsfor,
        '9999' as datediff
    FROM
        [Prod_CashFlow].[reporting].[CashFlowEntry]
    where
        (
            CAST(EndTime AS DATE) IS NULL
            or CAST(EndTime AS DATE) = @mEnddate
        )
        and Year = 0
),
pivotdata as (
    select
        *
    from
        (
            SELECT
                [WorkMatter],
                [Exposure],
                Cashflowentryperiod,
                CFProjectionsfor,
                [ValueName],
                [Amount],
                [EndUser],
                [EndTime]
            FROM
                CashFlowRaw
        ) AS SourceTable PIVOT (
            sum(Amount) FOR ValueName IN (Loss, DefExp, CovDJ)
        ) AS PivotData
)
select
    distinct p.[WorkMatter],
    [Exposure],
    Cashflowentryperiod,
    CFProjectionsfor,
    Sum(Loss) AS Loss,
    sum(DefExp) AS DefExp,
    sum(CovDJ) AS CovDJ
from
    pivotdata P
    join [Prod_CashFlow].[reporting].[WorkMatters] w on p.WorkMatter = w.WorkMatter
    join [Prod_CashFlow].[reporting].[Exposures] e on p.WorkMatter = e.WorkMatter
    and p.Exposure = e.ExpID 
group by
    p.[WorkMatter],
    [Exposure],
    Cashflowentryperiod,
    CFProjectionsfor
